description: Gaussian binomial coefficients [ n,2 ] for q = 7.
links: Todd Silvestri, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..591
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,2,7) for n in xrange(2,17)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009(PARI) Vec(1/((1-x)*(1-7*x)*(1-49*x)) + O(x^30)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 16 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
